feature_model.name: poker spl

meta.data: poker spl game. A FeatureIDE example

feature_model.feature_tree: :r PokerSPL(_r) :m Player(_r_1) :m Table(_r_2) :m Cards(_r_3) :g (_r_3_8) [1,1] : MaxPlayerCardsTwo(_r_3_8_9) : MaxPlayerCardsFive(_r_3_8_10) : MaxPlayerCardsSeven(_r_3_8_11) :o Wager(_r_4) :o Blinds(_r_4_5) :o IncreasingBlinds(_r_4_5_6) :o Pot(_r_4_7)
